data.NAME: altLangPage
data.DESCRIPTION: Link of translated web page without the site url. Start with a /, lowercase, word separated with dashes (not spaces) and no special characters. When this option is declared the language toggle is present, otherwise it's hidden.

data.NAME: breadcrumbs
data.CODEEXAMPLE:
breadcrumbs:
 - title: [first page title]
   link: [first absolute url of page]
 - title: [second page title]
 	 link: [second absolute url of page]
data.DESCRIPTION: An array of a title and a link. Set by default in posts to Canada.ca > About Canada.ca  > Canada.ca blog. Can be overridden in that format.

data.NAME: date
data.DESCRIPTION: Date in ISO format of creation date of post

data.NAME: description
data.DESCRIPTION: Will be used in meta name="description" and meta name="dcterm.description". Can't be empty, if not present the site description will be used. Page descriptions should be between 100 and 320 characters.

data.NAME: title
data.DESCRIPTION: Used for the title tag in the head, the h1 and the meta name="dcterms.title" tag. Page titles should be between 10 and 60 characters.

data.NAME: dateModified
data.DESCRIPTION: Date in ISO format of last modification date of post

data.NAME: lang
data.DESCRIPTION: Current language for the post. en and fr are the available options.
